items.content_html: temu-v0 is a lightweight framework designed for rapid application development. It simplifies the process of building scalable web applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces and efficient performance.

items.content_html: a lightweight and super-easy way to open videos directly in your external player like mpv. This tool consists of a browser extension and a Python-based protocol handler that work together to make launching videos in mpv a breeze.
items.title: MDallah/p48-protocol-web-mpv-linker: a lightweight and super-easy way to open videos directly in your external player like mpv. This tool consists of a browser extension and a Python-based protocol handler that work together to make launching videos in mpv a breeze.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight npm package for generating graphs based on user inputs. Easily create visual representations like percentage-based charts, bar graphs, or pie(under construction) charts with customizable options. Ideal for data visualization in Node.js applications.
items.title: AdnanDLuffy/Grapify: A lightweight npm package for generating graphs based on user inputs. Easily create visual representations like percentage-based charts, bar graphs, or pie(under construction) charts with customizable options. Ideal for data visualization in Node.js applications.
